amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the requirement that the Attorney General communicate corrective actions to the public.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-253 to remove the requirement that the Attorney General communicate corrective actions to the public.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lesko amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 231 (Roll no. 581).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Lesko.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
